remarks: 'Less than or equal to' relationship between division and multiplication.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
statement:
ltmul1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltmul1d.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ltmul1d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
lemuldiv2d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( C x. A ) <_ B <-> A <_ ( B / C ) ) ) $.
